title: Short-Term Course for Strengthening Elementary Mathematics Teacher Competencies Using Mobile Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics education theories and fundamental smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Course focused on developing mobile-based mathematics pedagogies applicable in real classrooms. Content creation and collaboration must be achievable via smartphones in PC-unavailable environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized math problem sets using mobile applications.

Within 1 week, learners will develop one mobile-based math lesson scenario reflecting an actual classroom environment (e.g., 3rd-grade fraction unit) and submit a result meeting â‰¥4 of 5 evaluation criteria (goal clarity, interaction design, technology utilization, etc.) based on peer assessment and instructor feedback.
Learners can share mobile lesson materials with peer teachers and provide feedback via a collaborative platform.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
